code: import{SIGNIN,AUTHENTICATED,SIGNOUT,SIGNOUT_SUCCESS,SHOW_AUTH_MESSAGE,HIDE_AUTH_MESSAGE,SIGNUP,SIGNUP_SUCCESS,SHOW_LOADING,SIGNIN_WITH_GOOGLE,SIGNIN_WITH_GOOGLE_AUTHENTICATED,SIGNIN_WITH_FACEBOOK,SIGNIN_WITH_FACEBOOK_AUTHENTICATED}from'../constants/Auth';export var signIn=function signIn(user){return{type:SIGNIN,payload:user};};export var authenticated=function authenticated(token){return{type:AUTHENTICATED,token:token};};export var signOut=function signOut(){return{type:SIGNOUT};};export var signOutSuccess=function signOutSuccess(){return{type:SIGNOUT_SUCCESS};};export var signUp=function signUp(user){return{type:SIGNUP,payload:user};};export var signUpSuccess=function signUpSuccess(token){return{type:SIGNUP_SUCCESS,token:token};};export var signInWithGoogle=function signInWithGoogle(){return{type:SIGNIN_WITH_GOOGLE};};export var signInWithGoogleAuthenticated=function signInWithGoogleAuthenticated(token){return{type:SIGNIN_WITH_GOOGLE_AUTHENTICATED,token:token};};export var signInWithFacebook=function signInWithFacebook(){return{type:SIGNIN_WITH_FACEBOOK};};export var signInWithFacebookAuthenticated=function signInWithFacebookAuthenticated(token){return{type:SIGNIN_WITH_FACEBOOK_AUTHENTICATED,token:token};};export var showAuthMessage=function showAuthMessage(message){return{type:SHOW_AUTH_MESSAGE,message:message};};export var hideAuthMessage=function hideAuthMessage(){return{type:HIDE_AUTH_MESSAGE};};export var showLoading=function showLoading(){return{type:SHOW_LOADING};};
